description: Problems coded with HITSP's 16K SNOMED subset
bestPractice: Each problem in the problem list should be coded with a SNOMED code from the HITSP Problem List valueset (OID 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.7.4).

points.3: > 80% of problems have a HITSP 16K SNOMED code
points.2: > 50% of problems have a HITSP 16K SNOMED code
points.1: At least one problem has a HITSP 16K SNOMED code
